name: Mr. Pete and The Iron Horse Game
name_original: Mr. Pete and The Iron Horse Game
description:
Controls

Move with [A] and [D] or [←] and [→]
Jump with [Space]

Menu navigation with  [↑] and [↓] or [W] and [S]
Validate with [Enter]

Pause with [Esc]

Fullscreen and Exit do not work on Browser


Credits

This game is based on the animated short film
"Mr. Pete and The Iron Horse" by Kilian Vilim.

Made by:
Etienne Mory

Music by:
Raffael Pochanke

Playtesting and Help:
Nathalie Brugger
Janosch Etter
Anna Henkel
Joel Hofmann
Veronica L. Montaño
Etienne Kompis
Kilian Vilim
YK Animation
